Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. I understand that its worth may be subjective to your needs and expectations, but let me assure you that it exceeds $12000 in value to us. Considering its unique features, quality, and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering this opportunity at an exclusive price of $15000. This is a chance to acquire a piece that not only meets but surpasses your requirements. If you're interested in learning more about how this product can enhance your life or business, please let me know. I'm looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
